broadwick.graph.writer

Class GraphViz

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.graph.writer.GraphViz

  • public final class GraphViz
extends Object
    Simple class to write the nodes/edges of a network in graphviz (dot) format. The static methods here will create a dot file that can be converted with the 'neato' graph manipulation tool.

    neato -Tpng example.dot -o example.png
